fields.headline: Somewhere for now
fields.bodyText: Europe UK: Downe Cottages (01237 441881) near Hartland on the North Devon coast has availability in one and two-bedroom cottages during the Easter holidays from £400 a week. Greece: A week starting April 3 at the self-catering Afrodite Apartments in Kalives, Crete, normally £381pp, now costs £381 for two, including flights and transfers. Sunvil Holidays (020-8568 4499). Channel Islands: Save 44% on a two-night break to Jersey. Travelsmith (0870 7481000 ) is offering two nights' B&B at the West View Hotel from £79pp, on bookings made by March 31. Prices include return travel from April 1-3, transfers and car hire. Spain: Spain at Heart (01373 814222) has availability at Villa España in Andalucia for one week from April 7. The modern, single-storey house has a private pool, sleeps up to six and is within walking distance of the sandy beaches of the Costa de la Luz. Prices range from £375pp (based on six sharing) and include scheduled flights with BA to Malaga and seven nights' accommodation. Italy: Waymark Holidays (01753 516477) is offering a seven-night walking holiday departing on April 22 based in San Gimignano, Tuscany, for £650pp. This holiday combines wonderful sightseeing with gentle walks through olive groves and vineyards in the rolling countryside of Tuscany. The price includes return flights from Gatwick to Pisa, seven-nights' half-board accommodation, taxes transfers and guide. Germany: Save £41 on a two-night midweek break at the three-star Hotel Hahn. The new price, £215pp (based on two sharing), includes B&B accommodation, and return flights with Lufthansa from London Heathrow. Valid for departures on April 2, 3 and 4. Travelscene (0870 7774445). Caribbean Grenada: Save £150 on a week's self-catering at the Blue Horizons Cottage Hotel departing March 28. The new price, £749pp, includes flights from Gatwick with JMC and transfers. Just Grenada (01373 814214). Asia India: Easter in Goa. Goa Way (020-7224 7070, www.goaway.co.uk), is offering 14 nights' room-only at the Holiday Beach Resort on Candolim Beach for £449 including flights departing Manchester on April 12. Africa Acacia Adventure Holidays (020-7706 4700, www.acacia-africa.com) is offering a 29-day South East African Adventure camping safari departing April 26 for £895 for two plus £150 each local payment. The tour will visit the Ngorongoro Crater, the Great Rift Valley, Zanzibar, Lake Malawi beaches, South Luangwa National Park and Victoria Falls. The price includes accommodation, all meals and entry fees. Flights extra.
